name: bcl2fastq2.20_v1.1.0
title: BCL to FASTQ v2.20
summary: Converts Illumina data from BCL to FASTQ using bcl2fastq v2.20 demultiplexing barcoded samples, for use with NextSeq, HiSeq, NovaSeq

inputSpec.name: upload_sentinel_record
inputSpec.label: Incremental upload sentinel record
inputSpec.help: The sentinel record produced by the the incremental_upload.sh script. When this record is closed it indicates that the upload is complete and bcl2fastq can begin.

inputSpec.name: run_archive
inputSpec.label: Archive of top level run folder
inputSpec.help: One archived file containing the top level output from the run. This archive should contain RunInfo.xml and be named the same as the original file.

inputSpec.name: sample_sheet
inputSpec.label: Sample sheet
inputSpec.help: The sample sheet file in CSV format.

inputSpec.name: advanced_opts
inputSpec.label: Advanced options
inputSpec.help: Additional command-line options to be passed verbatim to the invocation of bcl2fastq.

outputSpec.name: output
outputSpec.label: All files (except bcls) from the sequencer after demultiplexing
outputSpec.help: An array of files with run statistics

details.whatsNew: * 0.0.1: New app for converting bcl to fastq with bcl2fastq2.20
